metadata.dcterms:title: Raman spectra catalogue for inclusions in diamond
metadata.dcterms:creator: Smith, Evan
metadata.dcterms:description: A reference collection of Raman spectra for identifying inclusions in diamond. The catalogue contains spectra from real inclusions, as well as relevant mineral specimens and experimental products. Some spectra have been digitized from published figures, as a set of x-y coordinates.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Chemistry
Earth and Environmental Sciences
inclusions
diamond
Raman
identification
mineral
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Smith E.M., Krebs M.Y, Genzel P.-T., Brenker F.E. (2022) Raman identification of mineral inclusions in diamond. Reviews in Mineralogy and Geochemistry (in press), doi
